DESCRIPTION: Family-owned Mexican restaurant serving traditional recipes passed down through generations, featuring fresh ingredients and vibrant flavors
ABOUT_DESCRIPTION: Casa del Sol has been serving Austin authentic Mexican cuisine since 1987. Founded by the Hernandez family, we pride ourselves on traditional recipes, fresh daily-made salsas, and warm hospitality. Our vibrant atmosphere captures the spirit of Mexico with live mariachi music on weekends.
MENU_DESCRIPTION_1: Three corn tortillas with slow-cooked pork, onions, cilantro, and lime
MENU_DESCRIPTION_2: Roasted poblano peppers stuffed with cheese, battered and fried, topped with ranchero sauce
MENU_DESCRIPTION_3: Chicken breast in traditional mole sauce with chocolate and spices, served with rice and beans
MENU_DESCRIPTION_4: Fresh avocados mashed tableside with lime, cilantro, and jalapeños
APPETIZER_1_DESCRIPTION: Melted Oaxaca cheese with chorizo, poblano peppers, and warm tortillas
APPETIZER_2_DESCRIPTION: Grilled corn on the cob with mayo, cotija cheese, chili powder, and lime
APPETIZER_3_DESCRIPTION: House-made tortilla chips with beans, cheese, jalapeños, sour cream, and guacamole
APPETIZER_4_DESCRIPTION: Fresh jalapeños stuffed with cream cheese, wrapped in bacon, and fried
SOUP_1_DESCRIPTION: Traditional Mexican soup with tomatoes, peppers, onions, and crispy tortilla strips
SOUP_2_DESCRIPTION: Hominy soup with pork, dried chiles, and traditional seasonings
SALAD_1_DESCRIPTION: Crispy tortilla bowl with lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, beans, and choice of meat
SALAD_2_DESCRIPTION: Grilled cactus paddles with tomatoes, onions, cilantro, and lime vinaigrette
MAIN_1_DESCRIPTION: Grilled marinated skirt steak with rice, beans, pico de gallo, and warm tortillas
MAIN_2_DESCRIPTION: Three chicken enchiladas with green tomatillo sauce, cheese, and sour cream
MAIN_3_DESCRIPTION: Poblano peppers stuffed with picadillo, topped with walnut sauce and pomegranate
MAIN_4_DESCRIPTION: Red snapper in tomato sauce with olives, capers, and jalapeños
MAIN_5_DESCRIPTION: Sweet corn masa tamales with raisins and cinnamon, served with crema
MAIN_6_DESCRIPTION: Black beans, rice, grilled vegetables, cheese, and salsa verde in flour tortilla
DESSERT_1_DESCRIPTION: Sponge cake soaked in three milks, topped with whipped cream and cinnamon
DESSERT_2_DESCRIPTION: Crispy fried pastry sticks with cinnamon sugar and warm chocolate dipping sauce
DESSERT_3_DESCRIPTION: Traditional Mexican custard with caramel sauce and vanilla
DESSERT_4_DESCRIPTION: Light fried pastries dusted with powdered sugar and served with honey
WINE_1_DESCRIPTION: Spanish red wine, medium-bodied with berry flavors and smooth finish
WINE_2_DESCRIPTION: Crisp Spanish white wine with citrus notes and mineral finish
WINE_3_DESCRIPTION: House-made red wine sangria with fresh fruit and brandy
COCKTAIL_1_DESCRIPTION: Premium tequila with fresh lime juice, triple sec, and agave nectar
COCKTAIL_2_DESCRIPTION: Blanco tequila with grapefruit juice, lime, and sparkling water
COCKTAIL_3_DESCRIPTION: Artisanal mezcal with Campari, sweet vermouth, and orange peel
